description: Remove @tanstack/react-query and axios from the frontend entirely. Replace all useQuery/useMutation/axiosGet/axiosPost calls in page components with plain fetch() via the existing app/api/ Next.js proxy routes, using typed helpers (apiGet, apiPost, apiPatch, apiDelete) from lib/api/client.ts. Delete lib/api/axios.ts, lib/api/query-keys.ts, all TanStack-dependent hook files, and remove QueryClientProvider from the authenticated layout.

storyReference.file: plans/0000030 - Migrate Page Components to Use Custom Hooks.md

dependencies.title: Migrate Frontend Fetches to TanStack Query and Axios
dependencies.reason: The app/api/ proxy routes created by prior stories must exist. This story reverses the TanStack/Axios layer introduced in 0000029, keeping only the proxy routes and replacing axios/tanstack with plain fetch.

knowledgeBase.relevance: Full tech stack — Next.js App Router, lib/api/client.ts fetch wrapper pattern
UI routes and authenticated page structure

toModify.reason: Rewrite to use plain fetch() instead of axios. Keep same exported API: apiGet, apiPost, apiPatch, apiDelete. Add 401 redirect to /login.
Remove QueryClient, QueryClientProvider, ReactQueryDevtools imports and JSX wrapper.
Replace useQuery+axiosGet with useState+useEffect+apiGet. saveWorkflow/triggerWorkflow already use apiPost — keep those.
Largest file — replace all useQuery/useMutation/axiosGet/axiosPost/axiosPatch with useState+useEffect+apiGet/apiPost/apiPatch across all tab components.
Remove useUsers/useCreateUser/useUpdateUser hook imports. Replace with useState+useEffect+apiGet/apiPost/apiPatch from lib/api/client.
Remove all TanStack hook imports (useModelStatus etc). Replace with useState+useEffect+apiGet/apiPost/apiPatch/apiDelete from lib/api/client.
Remove QueryClientProvider wrapper. Change mock from @/lib/api/axios to @/lib/api/client (apiGet, apiPost, apiPatch).
Remove QueryClientProvider wrapper. Change mock from @/lib/api/axios to @/lib/api/client (apiGet, apiPost, apiPatch).
Remove QueryClientProvider wrapper and @/lib/api/axios mock. Mock global.fetch for useEffect data loads; keep @/lib/api/client mock for apiPost.

toDelete.reason: Axios instance and helpers — replaced by plain fetch in client.ts
TanStack query key constants — no longer needed without TanStack
TanStack hook — delete after migrating agents tab to direct apiGet/apiPatch
TanStack hook — delete after migrating dashboard tab
TanStack hook — delete after migrating backlog tab
TanStack hook — delete after migrating models page
TanStack hook — delete after migrating project query
TanStack hook — delete after migrating requirements tab
TanStack hook — delete after migrating backlog tab
TanStack hook — delete after migrating kanban/backlog/ticket tabs
TanStack hook — delete after migrating templates page
TanStack hook — delete after migrating users page
TanStack hook — delete after migrating blueprints/workflows tab

toLeave.reason: Pre-auth page — already uses plain fetch, must stay as-is
Next.js server-side proxy routes — these ARE the API layer. Do not change any route handler.
WebSocket hook — unrelated to TanStack, must remain
Auth context — check if it uses TanStack; if not, leave as-is
Route protection middleware — no data fetching, do not touch

conventions.packageManager: pnpm — always use pnpm --filter=frontend, never npm or yarn
conventions.framework: Next.js App Router — no Pages Router, no getServerSideProps
conventions.uiComponents: Shadcn UI only — do not install other component libraries
conventions.apiCalls: Always through /api/* proxy routes — never call backend port directly. Use apiGet/apiPost/apiPatch/apiDelete from lib/api/client.ts.
conventions.dataFetchingPattern: All data loading in page components uses useState + useEffect + apiGet. Mutations call apiPost/apiPatch/apiDelete directly inside async event handlers. No useQuery, no useMutation, no TanStack anywhere in page components.
conventions.arrayGuard: All apiGet responses that return arrays must guard: Array.isArray(data) ? data : []
conventions.noTanstack: After this migration, @tanstack/react-query must not be imported anywhere in apps/frontend/app/
conventions.noAxios: After this migration, axios and @/lib/api/axios must not be imported anywhere in apps/frontend/app/
conventions.clientTs: lib/api/client.ts is the ONLY HTTP abstraction. It uses plain fetch(). On 401, redirect window.location.href to /login.
conventions.typecheck: Run pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit after completing each user story

userStories.title: Audit existing app/api/ proxy routes and create any missing ones
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to confirm that every API call made by the pages being migrated has a corresponding app/api/ Next.js proxy route handler so no gaps are left after TanStack/axios is removed.
acceptanceCriteria: Read every file under apps/frontend/app/api/ and produce a list of existing routes with their supported HTTP methods

Cross-reference the list against every apiGet/apiPost/apiPatch/apiDelete call needed by: projects/page.tsx, templates/page.tsx, blueprints/page.tsx, projects/[id]/page.tsx (all tabs), settings/users/page.tsx, settings/models/page.tsx

The following routes are already confirmed to exist and do NOT need to be created: projects, projects/[id], agents, agents/[agentId], agents/[agentId]/sync, stories, stories/[storyId], tasks, tasks/[taskId], comments, approve, answer, epics, epics/[epicId], sprints, sprints/[sprintId], sprints/[sprintId]/ready, requirements, requirements/[docId], analytics, workflows, workflows/runs/[runId], templates, templates/[id], users, users/[id], models, settings, workflows/templates

For each gap found, create a new route.ts file in the correct app/api/ directory following the exact same pattern as apps/frontend/app/api/projects/route.ts: getAuth() helper reads accessToken cookie, proxies to BACKEND_URL/<resource> with Authorization header, returns NextResponse.json with matching status
If no gaps exist, document that finding in notes
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes for any new route files

userStories.title: Uninstall TanStack Query and Axios packages
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to remove @tanstack/react-query, @tanstack/react-query-devtools, and axios from the frontend package so the codebase no longer depends on them.
acceptanceCriteria: Run: pnpm --filter=frontend remove @tanstack/react-query @tanstack/react-query-devtools axios
@tanstack/react-query, @tanstack/react-query-devtools, and axios do NOT appear in apps/frontend/package.json after removal
Note: TypeScript errors will exist after this step until later stories complete — that is expected

userStories.title: Rewrite lib/api/client.ts to use plain fetch
userStories.description: As a developer, I need lib/api/client.ts to use plain fetch() instead of axios so all page components can import a single typed HTTP helper that calls the /api/ proxy routes.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/lib/api/client.ts does NOT import axios or @/lib/api/axios
Exports: apiGet<T>(path: string): Promise<T> — GET with credentials: 'include'
Exports: apiPost<T>(path: string, body?: unknown): Promise<T> — POST with Content-Type: application/json
Exports: apiPatch<T>(path: string, body?: unknown): Promise<T> — PATCH with Content-Type: application/json
Exports: apiDelete<T>(path: string): Promise<T> — DELETE
On any 401 response: if (typeof window !== 'undefined') window.location.href = '/login'
On non-ok response: throw an Error with message from response body if available
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes for this file in isolation (other files may still error)

userStories.title: Remove QueryClientProvider from authenticated layout
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to remove QueryClientProvider and ReactQueryDevtools from the authenticated layout since TanStack Query is being removed.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/app/(authenticated)/layout.tsx does NOT import QueryClient, QueryClientProvider, or ReactQueryDevtools
The <QueryClientProvider> wrapper and <ReactQueryDevtools> element are removed from the JSX
The queryClient constant is removed
Children are rendered directly without a QueryClient wrapper
The layout still renders the AuthProvider and AuthenticatedShell correctly
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes for layout.tsx (other files may still error)

userStories.title: Migrate projects/page.tsx to plain fetch
userStories.description: As a developer, I need projects/page.tsx to use apiGet/apiPost with useState+useEffect so it has no TanStack or axios dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/app/(authenticated)/projects/page.tsx does NOT import from @tanstack/react-query, @/lib/api/axios, or @/lib/api/query-keys
Project list loaded via useState([]) + useEffect(() => { apiGet('/api/projects').then(...) }, [])
Template list in NewProjectWizard loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet('/api/templates')
Create project calls apiPost('/api/projects', payload) directly in the submit handler, then updates local state or re-fetches
Loading spinner still shown while fetching (loading state via useState(true))
Verify in browser: navigate to /projects — project list renders; New Project wizard opens and templates load; creating a project works
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate templates/page.tsx to plain fetch
userStories.description: As a developer, I need templates/page.tsx to use apiGet/apiPost/apiPatch with useState+useEffect so it has no TanStack or axios dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/app/(authenticated)/templates/page.tsx does NOT import from @tanstack/react-query, @/lib/api/axios, or @/lib/api/query-keys
Template list loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet('/api/templates')
Save template (create/update) calls apiPost or apiPatch directly in the handler, then re-fetches or updates local state
Import template calls apiPost('/api/templates', data) directly in the file handler
Verify in browser: navigate to /templates — template grid renders; new template modal saves; export/import works
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate blueprints/page.tsx to plain fetch
userStories.description: As a developer, I need blueprints/page.tsx to replace its useQuery+axiosGet calls with useState+useEffect+apiGet, while keeping the existing apiPost calls for save/trigger.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/app/(authenticated)/projects/[id]/blueprints/page.tsx does NOT import from @tanstack/react-query or @/lib/api/axios
Workflow templates loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet('/api/workflows/templates')
Workflow runs (execution history) loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet(`/api/projects/${projectId}/workflows`) with enabled guard
saveWorkflow() and triggerWorkflow() continue to use apiPost from @/lib/api/client (already correct — just remove axiosGet/useQuery)
refetchTemplates pattern replaced: after save, re-call apiGet and setTemplates
Verify in browser: navigate to /projects/[id]/blueprints — workflow templates load in sidebar; Save button creates a template; Trigger button fires a workflow run
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate projects/[id]/page.tsx — main project query, Dashboard, and Agents tabs
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the main project useQuery, Dashboard analytics, and Agents tab in projects/[id]/page.tsx to use useState+useEffect+apiGet so they have no TanStack or axios dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Top-level project query replaced: useState<Project|null>(null) + useEffect + apiGet(`/api/projects/${id}`)
Dashboard tab burn rate and distribution loaded via useState + useEffect + apiGet(`/api/projects/${projectId}/analytics?...`)
AgentsTab: agents loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet(`/api/projects/${projectId}/agents`)
AgentsTab: stories loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories`)
Save agent: apiPatch(`/api/projects/${projectId}/agents/${agentId}`, payload) directly in handler
Sync agent: apiPost(`/api/projects/${projectId}/agents/${agentId}/sync`, {fields}) directly in handler
No useQuery/useMutation/axiosGet/axiosPatch/axiosPost in these sections
Verify in browser: /projects/[id] loads project name in header; Dashboard tab shows charts; Agents tab shows agent cards
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate projects/[id]/page.tsx — Backlog tab
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Backlog tab in projects/[id]/page.tsx to use useState+useEffect+api* calls so it has no TanStack or axios dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Stories, epics, sprints each loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet
Create story: apiPost(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories`, form) then re-fetch or update state
Create epic: apiPost(`/api/projects/${projectId}/epics`, {title}) then update state
Mark sprint ready: apiPost(`/api/projects/${projectId}/sprints/${sprintId}/ready`) then update state
Load tasks for story: apiGet(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories/${storyId}/tasks`)
Toggle task: apiPatch(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories/${storyId}/tasks/${taskId}`, {completed: ...})
Create task: apiPost(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories/${storyId}/tasks`, {title})
No useQuery/useMutation/axiosGet/axiosPost/axiosPatch in BacklogTab
Verify in browser: Backlog tab renders stories/epics/sprints; creating a story adds it to the list
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate projects/[id]/page.tsx — Kanban tab
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the Kanban tab to use useState+useEffect+apiGet/apiPatch so it has no TanStack or axios dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Stories loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories`)
Drag-and-drop column change: apiPatch(`/api/projects/${projectId}/stories/${storyId}`, {status: toCol}) then update local state
No useQuery/useMutation/axiosGet/axiosPatch remain in KanbanTab
Verify in browser: Kanban board renders with story cards in correct columns; dragging a card updates its column
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate projects/[id]/page.tsx — Ticket Dialogue, Workflows, Requirements, and Settings tabs
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the remaining four tabs in projects/[id]/page.tsx to use api* calls directly so the file has no TanStack or axios dependencies at all.
acceptanceCriteria: KanbanTab ticket modal (TicketDialogueTab): comments loaded via apiGet on modal open, post comment via apiPost, tasks via apiGet, toggle task via apiPatch, approve via apiPost, answer via apiPost
BlueprintsTab (workflow trigger tab): workflows list loaded via apiGet; trigger via apiPost(`/api/projects/${projectId}/workflows`, {templateId})
RequirementsTab: docs loaded via useState + useEffect + apiGet; update doc via apiPatch; create doc via apiPost
ProjectSettingsTab: save settings via apiPatch(`/api/projects/${projectId}`, {...})
No useQuery/useMutation/axiosGet/axiosPost/axiosPatch remain ANYWHERE in projects/[id]/page.tsx
No @tanstack/react-query or @/lib/api/axios imports remain in projects/[id]/page.tsx
Verify in browser: clicking a kanban card opens ticket modal with comments; Requirements tab renders doc tree; Project Settings tab saves
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Migrate settings/users/page.tsx and settings/models/page.tsx to plain fetch
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the users and models settings pages to call api* functions directly instead of using TanStack hooks from hooks/useUsers.ts and hooks/useModels.ts.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/app/(authenticated)/settings/users/page.tsx does NOT import from hooks/useUsers, @tanstack/react-query, or @/lib/api/axios
Users page: user list loaded via useState([]) + useEffect + apiGet('/api/users')
Create user: apiPost('/api/users', payload) in handler
Toggle role / toggle status: apiPatch(`/api/users/${id}`, payload) in handler
apps/frontend/app/(authenticated)/settings/models/page.tsx does NOT import from hooks/useModels, @tanstack/react-query, or @/lib/api/axios
Models page: model status loaded via apiGet('/api/models?action=status'), providers via apiGet('/api/models?action=providers') — both in useEffect

Pull: apiPost('/api/models', {action:'pull', model}); Delete: apiDelete(`/api/models?model=...`); Load: apiPost('/api/models', {action:'load', model}); Unload: apiPost('/api/models', {action:'unload', model}); Toggle provider: apiPatch('/api/models', {provider, enabled})
Verify in browser: /settings/users lists users, invite user works; /settings/models shows Ollama status and provider toggles
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Delete TanStack hooks directory files and lib/api/axios.ts + query-keys.ts
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to delete all files that no longer have any consumers so the codebase is clean and free of dead code.
acceptanceCriteria: Delete apps/frontend/lib/api/axios.ts
Delete apps/frontend/lib/api/query-keys.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useAgents.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useAnalytics.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useEpics.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useModels.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useProject.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useRequirements.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useSprints.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useStories.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useTemplates.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useUsers.ts
Delete apps/frontend/hooks/useWorkflows.ts
Keep apps/frontend/hooks/useProjectSocket.ts — it is a WebSocket hook and must remain
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes with no errors after all deletions

userStories.title: Update tests to remove TanStack/axios dependencies
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the three test files to stop using QueryClientProvider and @/lib/api/axios mocks so they match the new plain-fetch architecture.
acceptanceCriteria: apps/frontend/__tests__/projects/agents.test.tsx: remove QueryClient/QueryClientProvider wrapper and createWrapper() helper; remove @/lib/api/axios mock; add jest.mock('@/lib/api/client', () => ({ apiGet: jest.fn(), apiPost: jest.fn(), apiPatch: jest.fn() })); update mockAxiosGet → mockApiGet using apiGet mock; update assertions to check apiGet/apiPatch instead of axiosGet/axiosPatch
apps/frontend/__tests__/projects/kanban.test.tsx: same pattern — remove TanStack wrapper; mock @/lib/api/client instead of @/lib/api/axios; update all assertions

apps/frontend/__tests__/projects/blueprints.test.tsx: remove QueryClient/QueryClientProvider wrapper; remove @/lib/api/axios mock; keep @/lib/api/client mock for apiPost; add global.fetch mock for template/workflow useEffect loads
pnpm --filter=frontend test passes with all tests green
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes

userStories.title: Final audit — zero TanStack and zero axios in frontend app
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to confirm that no TanStack Query or axios imports remain anywhere in the frontend app/ directory and that all tests pass.
acceptanceCriteria: Run: grep -r '@tanstack/react-query' apps/frontend/app — output must be empty
Run: grep -r 'from.*@/lib/api/axios' apps/frontend/app — output must be empty
Run: grep -r 'from.*@/lib/api/query-keys' apps/frontend/app — output must be empty
pnpm --filter=frontend tsc --noEmit passes with zero errors
pnpm --filter=frontend test passes with all tests green
Verify in browser: /projects loads, /templates loads, /projects/[id] all tabs work, /projects/[id]/blueprints works, /settings/users works, /settings/models works — no console errors on any page
